meanings.definition: A person who revises or edits something.
meanings.sent1: The revisors carefully checked the essay for any mistakes.
meanings.sent2: The revisors worked together to improve the final draft.
meanings.sent3: The revisors found a funny typo and shared a laugh.
meanings.sent4: The revisors were like detectives hunting for errors.
meanings.sent5: The revisors' job is to polish and perfect the writing.

meanings.definition: A group of people who review and make changes to a document or text.
meanings.sent1: The revisors met to discuss the changes needed in the report.
meanings.sent2: The revisors collaborated to ensure the document was error-free.
meanings.sent3: The revisors had a pizza party after finishing their edits.
meanings.sent4: The revisors were like artists, adding brushstrokes to the text.
meanings.sent5: The revisors' teamwork improved the document significantly.
